safari-mac-install.title: Safari on macOS
captions: Click ont the Apple icon in the top left corner of your screen.
Chose 'Settings'.
Select checkbox on the BlockLang extension to enable it.
Select if you want 'Allow in Private Browsing.' and 'Share across devices.'
The BlockLang icon should appear in the toolbar.

safari-mac-site.title: Safari on macOS
safari-mac-site.description: Add site filter on Safari macOS.
captions: Find the BlockLang icon in the toolbar.
Click on it. You will see a popup with disabled BlockLang extension.
When the BlockLang extension is disabled, enter site name into the search abr.
You will see a result like this.
Click on the BlockLang icon. Add domain name to the 'Site Filter' field.
Click 'Add' to add the site to the filter list.
The site will be shown in the list below.
Click on the BlockLang button to turn the extension on.
Into the search bar type the site name to check if it is filtered.
